transcript.text: Let’s take a closer look at how a conflict of interest is defined.

panelText.text:
1. You have a personal interest (could be a job, relationship, financial interest or work opportunity).
  2. This interest is somehow at odds with the best interests of Johnson Controls.
When conflicts of interests are not properly addressed, they can divide your loyalties, affect your business judgment and compromise your or Johnson Controls’ reputation for doing business ethically.
